resources.string: This quiz covers some of the basic information that every Android Developer and GWG Udacity student should be familar with!
Q1: Which is an object-oriented programming language and a platform originated by Sun Microsystems.
Q2: A pane in the Android Studio project window that displays the structure of the emulator layout is the ___
Q3: An event handler will do which of the following?
Q4:Which of the following XML options are correct? Check all that apply.
Q5: What does dp stand for?
Q6: Pseudocode is: Check all that apply.
Q7: What is a Relative Layout?
Q8: T/F Pascal case is text that begins with an uppercase letter, and uses an uppercase letter to start each new word after.
Q9: A "View" is anything on the screen that we can see and/or interact with such as TextViews, Buttons, ImageViews, and so on.
Q10: How many bits are in a byte?
Ready to submit? Double check your answers, then click Submit Answers below.
